snippet.title: Grime - Reveal Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Destroy... Absorb... Grow... GRIME is a fast and unforgiving Action-Adventure RPG in which you crush your foes with living weapons that mutate form and function, and then consume their remains with a black hole to strengthen your vessel as you break apart a world of anatomical horror and intrigue. GRIME was revealed with a sensual intro during Guerrilla Collective Day 2 and is coming 2021.

#SummerOfGaming
